analysisMethod: Direct on-chain inspection - addresses are plaintext visible
findings: 160 transfers have BOTH sender AND recipient addresses visible on-chain
Bulletproofs successfully hide amounts but provide zero address privacy
50.5% of transfers have partial or full address exposure
vulnerabilities: CRITICAL: Sender and recipient addresses are VISIBLE on-chain in 50% of transfers
CRITICAL: Bulletproofs only hide amounts - transaction graph is fully analyzable
HIGH: 40% of addresses reused - enables clustering attacks
recommendations: ShadowWire should NOT be used when address privacy is required
Bulletproofs alone are insufficient - need stealth addresses or similar
Consider Privacy Cash or SilentSwap for address privacy needs
If using ShadowWire, combine with external mixing for address obfuscation
